segments.text: Daniel , here is some money for the tickets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , it's my pleasure . How many tickets ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , like a gentleman . Two tickets for two people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I am only half a person as you and they charge both of us the same price tickets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They may unless we get a half-price ticket for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may ask if you can take a half-price ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I make certain . A half-price ticket cuts us one point five Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2
